text: Only hungry howie's I go to....the employees are friendly and Aaron always goes above and beyond to make sure you are satisfied

name: Jeffrey Harris
text: Great service!

name: freluarelue39 freluarelue39
text: Excellent food, helpful staff, regularly  awesome ambience. They charge affordable prices and the food quality is good. 5 stars.

name: Jeanie Shastal
text: I usually get a pizza delivered from here and usually it's on point HOWEVER the one I got tonight was a hot mess...I ordered a half supreme  half pineapple  tomatoes and sausage...not what I got no 2 pieces the same pepperoni  on one piece of pineapple  not on any pieces  sausage and olives on all it was horrible no excuse

name: Jessica Humiston
text: My orders always arrive swiftly and the pizza is always hot. On the one occasion that my order was messed up, they fixed it right away. Love this place!

name: Dave M
text: Food was great and very hot.keep up the good work.im always a repeat customer!

name: Electric EEL
text: Good pizza at a good price. Their reward program is great too. This location does a good job at getting the order correct every time.

name: Dan Spencer
text: Normally have no issues here and pizza is pretty good. Had an issue last weekend when I ordered the breast cancer awareness deal. The deal clearly states any topping so I did then got the extra fee for that topping. Employee stated all …More

name: AMBER DAVIS
text: Food was great as usual

name: Llissa Cooney
text: Pizza and wings are always good!

name: Matthew
text: Order from here all the time. Quality pizza each time and quick delivery. Love how late they are open as well. I never feel like I need another pizza place in the Waterford area.

name: Thea Burby
text:
Worst pizza and greek salad we are ever had from this location. And when I called tell them, their response was "Thank You".
Very dissatisfied😣

name: Michael Halcomb
text: Will never order from their again worst service ever and everything was cold and looked like someone picked something off my pizza. Needs all new management have been ordering for years. All service has went down.

name: Superficial Case
text: Solid pizza, and I always send in a mobile order. So far, they've always had it ready. Great employees!

name: Asam Southards
text: Ordered online, pizza wasnt made right, was missing a 2 liter and the coupon code didnt work, spent over $30 on pizza and everything is wrong I suggest going to a different hungry howies or get something else...

name: Steven Childs
text: Food was good, we ordered in the store, and received quick turn around. They don't deliver to Pontiac. I won't be visiting this location ever again (Because they don't deliver to Pontiac). Girl at the front counter, blonde hair, was less …More

name: amy hribar
text: love the deep dish and boneless wings!

name: Jack Z
text: They're now charging nearly $6 for their delivery fee.  That's unprecedented.  That's half the price of the actual pizza.  I can't justify that.  No one charges that much for a delivery fee.  That's outrageous.  They just lost a lot of business from me.

name: Abeja Yaj
text: Taste like cardboard. For a min I thought I was eating old Lil Caesars pizza . Got my whole order wrong too. I ordered pepperoni and w/ butter cheese crust and guess what I didn't get any of that. Matter of fact there was very little to no …More

name: Lora Rodriguez
text: Got the Asian chicken pizza and stuffed jalapeno cheese bread. Bread was amazing but the pizza was disgusting to say the least. It was so soggy from the sauce they used it was just dripping off the pizza, and we had to take napkins to it …More

name: Carl Shaw
text: When I ordered on the app it failed to update the closest store near me (I live in Highland Twp)so I had to drive to waterford  just to pick up my order otherwise i had no complaints

name: Teresa Jordan
text: Thank You My pizza is delicious

name: Rich Brooks
text: Most consistent and reliable pizza in the area as far as chains go

name: Frank Colon
text: Great food, never had a complain

name: Alan Fiorillo
text: White Lake Highland Road, the best one. They do a great job, pepperoni, garlic and butter crust with sesame seed all over it. Try it you'll like it, we all do, so much so we go there every week.

name: Gary Fink
text: Very good subs and deep dish pizza

name: Timothy Lindley
text: Gay Mike and the crew always get my order right. Their pizza is always fresh and isnt put together sloppily! This is my favorite Hungry Howies!

name: SCATMAN1066
text: Great pizza great price

name: Daniel Lilly
text: Won't deliver within 3 miles of their location, unheard of. And, extremely rude. I've managed a restaurant for 7 years, can't believe such awful service. Never again.

name: Dan Warren
text: Fast and the food was great (no compromise for speed)

name: Allicia Marengere
text: What's not to love about Hungary Howie's?! Try their flavored crust...Ah-Yum! <3

name: Angela Bryant
text: Ordered online for pickup. Everything was ready quickly and correctly. Place was clean and counter staff attentive and courteous.

name: Brian DelGreco
text: As most national chain pizza joints they are a bit over priced. But, great pizza! Better than the one on Dixie.

name: Lasonia Evans
text: This place was quick and the really show that the care. I like them way better then the one in PONTIAC so 2 thumbs ☝

name: Food GUY
text: Great staff always hot food and always quicker than they tell you !

name: Jae B
text: I ordered on the phone for pickup. Asked for 2 extra dipping sauces, the garlic cream cheese kind. I get there, pay for my order, and wait about a minute until it is ready. I was then given 4 marinara sauces. (2 come with the bread, i had …More

name: Isaac Zager
text: There was not a lot of toppings but overall it was ok

name: Jerry Carson
text: Not worth ordering the pizza they don't put many toppings on at all but charging quite a bit for their Pizza

name: Lisa Mcwhinnie
text: My on line order was placed at a wrong location and my preferred location that I went to look care of ordering me new pizza and even gave me coupons to use.

name: Jeanette Sterling
text: Had not Ordered in a long time but when I did pizza was over cooked for a thin crust & the delivery guy again cont. To ask for a tip over 4x's. Really uncalled for. …More

name: ShadowFyr SixtyTwo
text: Disappointed. While toppings were plentiful, the pizza had no flavor beyond the crust. Not returning.

name: Dawn Mari Collom
text: It's good, standard Hungry Howie's food. The place is clean. The staff wears gloves and hair protection. The food is good. The prep times are variable, presumably based on staff and orders. Not my favorite pizza, not my least favorite pizza...but for a Hungry Howie's its 100% what it should be.

name: Stephanie Last
text: Just got our pick up order. Every time we order pick up they always forget the ranchm wouldnt be such a big deal except they charge .75 a thing and i always get one with each of my howie rolls. Very disappointing

name: Junior Seau
text: Absolutely disgusted at managment and the service. Their food was undercooked and basically just poured the cheese and toppings in the middle. Management would not replace it or even give me my money back. Very rude also. Never going there again.

name: Nancy Franz
text: Good pizza. Used to be located down the street, I was confused and drove past it. It's in the meijer parking lot now.

name: S Baidya
text: Service is nice.

name: Tom Jackson
text: Ordered a large deep dish pizza. Guy at the counter had a chip on his shoulder. Was simply a regular pizza in the shape of a rectangle. Could've gone to Jet's for the same prize and much better quality.

name: KaotiKMusic Official
text: The last 4 orders I've had from this location have been horrible. No crust flavors that I order are put on. Pizza's are crushed inside the box. Deliveries are only timely 50% of the time. And I end up tipping at least 4-5 dollars everytime …More

text: Love their pizza the most out of every other place.
